helpful: 2 of 3 people (67%) found this review helpful
review: It's free, fun and rewarding to play. Ski at speeds of 300 and 400Kph. Kill people with a hand-held mortar, Snipe players while they go insanely fast, Chase a flag capper at amazing speeds, do what you want when you want. My most played game, the only thing you need to do is hit the install button.
